com.outbrain.aletheia.datum.production

Class AletheiaBuilder<TDomainClass,TBuilder extends AletheiaBuilder<TDomainClass,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.outbrain.aletheia.datum.production.AletheiaBuilder<TDomainClass,TBuilder>
  • Type Parameters:
    TDomainClass - The datum type this builder will be building a DatumProducer or DatumConsumerStream for.
    TBuilder - The concrete type of builder, used for type safety, to be filled in by deriving classes.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatumConsumerStreamsBuilder, DatumProducerBuilder

    public abstract class AletheiaBuilder<TDomainClass,TBuilder extends AletheiaBuilder<TDomainClass,?>>
extends Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  AletheiaBuilder.BreadcrumbProducingHandler 
      protected static class  AletheiaBuilder.InternalBreadcrumbProducerMetricFactoryProvider
      A special case AletheiaMetricFactoryProvider used only when reporting metrics from a breadcrumb dedicated DatumProducer, that is, a DatumProducer whose only purpose in life is to produce breadcrumbs (breadcrumb is itself, a special kind of datum).

      • deliverBreadcrumbsTo

        public TBuilder deliverBreadcrumbsTo(ProductionEndPoint breadcrumbProductionEndPoint,
                            BreadcrumbsConfig breadcrumbsConfig)
        Configures Breadcrumb sending to a given destination, and configuration.
        Parameters:
        breadcrumbProductionEndPoint - a ProductionEndPoint instance where Breadcrumb will be sent.
        breadcrumbsConfig - a configuration for the breadcrumb dispatching mechanism.
        Returns:
        A TBuilder instance whose breadcrumbs have been configured.

      • registerProductionEndPointType

        public <TProductionEndPoint extends ProductionEndPoint,UProductionEndPoint extends TProductionEndPoint> TBuilder registerProductionEndPointType(Class<TProductionEndPoint> endPointType,
                                                                                                                                       DatumEnvelopeSenderFactory<? super UProductionEndPoint> datumEnvelopeSenderFactory)
        Registers a ProductionEndPoint type. After the registration, data can be produced to an instance of this endpoint type.
        Parameters:
        endPointType - the type of the custom endpoint to register.
        datumEnvelopeSenderFactory - a DatumEnvelopeSenderFactory capable of building com.outbrain.aletheia.datum.production.NamedSender's from the specified endpoint type.
        Returns:
        A TBuilder instance with the custom production endpoint registered.

      • reportMetricsTo

        public TBuilder reportMetricsTo(MetricsFactory metricFactory)
        Configures metrics reporting.
        Parameters:
        metricFactory - A MetricsFactory instance to report metrics to.
        Returns:
        A TBuilder instance with metrics reporting configured.
